summary: This is a U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons overtime authorization form dated August 19, 2019, for an employee at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It authorizes and certifies overtime work on Saturday, August 10, 2019, from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM due to an 'institutional emergency'.

persons.name: MCC New York
persons.context: The Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York is the institution where the overtime work is authorized to take place.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The Warden or an authorized supervisor is the official who authorizes the overtime work due to an institutional emergency.

events.title: Overtime Work at MCC New York
events.description: An employee at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York worked overtime from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM on a Saturday due to an institutional emergency.

keyFacts: The document is a Federal Bureau of Prisons overtime authorization form dated August 19, 2019.
It authorizes overtime work at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on Saturday, August 10, 2019, from 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
The stated reason for the overtime is a 'DUE TO INSTITUTIONAL EMERGENCY'.
The form is part of the Epstein case document set (EFTA00142417), suggesting it relates to activities at the MCC around the time Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.
